actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal certain tax subsidies related to energy and natural resources.
short_title: Termination of Energy and Natural Resource Tax Subsidies Act of 1995

summary.text: Termination of Energy and Natural Resource Tax Subsidies Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the expensing of intangible drilling and development costs and of mining exploration and development costs. Repeals limitations on percentage depletion in the case of oil and gas wells. Repeals the exception from passive loss rules for working interest in oil and gas property. Terminates the credit for any qualified fuels produced from a nonconventional source. Repeals the alcohol fuels credit. Repeals the reduced fuel tax rates for certain fuels.

titles.title: Termination of Energy and Natural Resource Tax Subsidies Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal certain tax subsidies related to energy and natural resources.
